pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hybrid Method for Multiple Criteria Decision-Making (MCDM) // Implementation of a hybrid MCDM method build from the AHP (Analytic Hierarchy Process) and TOPSIS-2N (Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution - with two normalizations). This method is described in Souza et al. (2018) doi: 10.1142/S0219622018500207.
